title: Zweet Shop – Zweet Shop, fulfilled by OurBasket
text: The Halloween candy lineup you’ve been waiting for. Candy That Will Make Your Mouth Pucker! We got tired of candy that promised SOUR, but under-delivered (it drove us INSANE), so we made REAL INSANELY SOUR CANDY. Show us your Sour face! Marshmallows so soft and airy, almost like CLOUDZ melting in your mouth! The perfect treat for the lunchbox, candy table at a party or any time that zweet craving hits! Try them in s’mores, top hot cocoa or coffee or best of all, snack’em right out of the bag! Try all 3 flavors! Some might say we never quite grew up. As kids we fell in love with the classic sour belts from the corner candy shop and have never quite let go. All grown up we searched and searched for that classic sour belt: just the right amount of sour, the perfect texture and snap when you take a bite.... and Zweet was born! You're allowed to play with your food when it's this fun! Head to our crafts page to get fun ideas, DIYs, recipes and more. The possibilities are endless! Perfect for birthdays, holidays, favors and gifts.
